data.name: M.O.O.D.S.
data.detailed_description:
JOIN OUR DISCORD!


About the Game

M.O.O.D.S. is an emotionally-charged bullet-hell action rogue-lite set in a world where robots fight for the monopolies of emotion. Smash the rulers with powerful weapons, equipment and abilities, experiment with endless weapon upgrades and liberate the world of tomorrow!

PROCEDURAL ACTION AND HIGH REPLAY VALUE

Make your way through procedural dungeons in the best rogue-lite style - engage in heated battles and disassemble a host of hostile mechs into their component parts. In the process, you will also be disassembled and die, die, die. But a mech body is quickly cobbled together again ... Every trip into the depths of the dungeons is unique!

LOOT LIKE THERE IS NO TOMORROW

In the mech world of M.O.O.D.S. there is a lot to loot. You'll have weapons, weapon upgrades and equipment at your disposal that you've never even dreamed of! Equipment abilities and their properties are procedurally generated - and there are Epics!

EXPERIMENT


Every weapon can be modified (almost) infinitely - but don't blow yourself up! Experiment with the weapon modifiers - until you achive ultimate firepower!

CHOOSE YOUR CLASS

Prepare for action-packed combat by choosing the right class. You can choose up to 8 different classes with unique abilities!

FREE THE EMOTION MONOPOLIES

Defeat the rulers of the emotion monopolies in epic and thrilling boss battles - which include intelligent attack patterns and classic bullet-hell circles.

data.short_description: M.O.O.D.S. is an emotionally-charged bullet-hell action rogue-lite set in a world where robots fight for the monopolies of emotion. Smash the rulers with powerful weapons, equipment and abilities, experiment with endless weapon upgrades and liberate the world of tomorrow!
data.reviews:
“Es ist zu jeder Sekunde spürbar, wie viel Liebe und Hirnschmalz in die Ausarbeitung und das Balancing des Spiels geflossen sind. Jede Waffe ist penibel ausgetüftelt, überzeugt mit eigenem Spielefühl und – am wichtigsten – macht direkt Spaß.”
Multi Mania

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA: Geforce GTX 660, AMD: Radeon HD7850
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce(TM) GTX 970 or better, AMD Radeon R9 290X or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
